title: The Java Source Attachment Preference Page has excessive white space
description: The Java Source Attachment Preference Page has a label that is positioned with a significant amount of white space in the middle of the page. This affects the vertical alignment of the label.
OB: The Java Source Attachment Preference Page has a label positioned in the middle with excessive white space. The vertical alignment of the label should be set to SWT.ALIGN_BEGINNING.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1) Load a project from the repository 
2) Select a source folder 
3) Open Properties 
4) Navigate to Java Source Attachment 
5) An info label will be displayed in the middle of the dialog.
